author: greystroke
content: Is there any plans to provide guidance on Fusaka supernode requirements by updating eip-7870?  Stakers need guidance here so they have time to prepare accordingly.

author: parithosh
content: Once the next devnet (devnet 5) is done and we have some bpo values - we should have a more concrete idea for what requirements will look like for supernodes
